brief_description: The Department of Higher Education, Government of Madhya Pradesh has created this new scholarship scheme available for candidates belonging to the General categories.
detailed_description: There are many objectives of this scheme presented by the organization of Madhya Pradesh Government. This scholarship scheme is presented by the Department of Higher Education that means the scholarship will be helpful for the students who are pursuing further education after they have successfully completed their Class 12th. These scholarship opportunities are only available for the candidates belonging to the General category and that is one of the most important aspects of these schemes.
benefits: Annual financial assistance of a maximum of Rs. 2,500/-
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must belong to the General category. He/she must have scored at least 60% or more marks in the Class 12 examination. The annual family income of the applicant should not exceed INR 1,20,000 (for higher education) and INR 54,000 (for graduation).

steps: General students should register themselves on the portal .  Click on New Registration and provide the required details for registration. After registration, log in again with credentials. Enter the required details. Upload the necessary documents. Submit.

documents_required: Samagra ID. Current college code. Branch code. Recent passport size photograph. Caste certificate. Income certificate of parents. Resident proof.
